text: Jinrui wa (motomoto) ichizokudeatta. Sorede arrā wa, yogen-sha-tachi o kippō to keikoku no dentatsu-sha to shite noko wa sa reta. Mata kare-ra to tomoni shinri ni yoru keiten o kudashi, sorede, hitobito no ma ni iron no aru shuju no koto ni tsuite saitei sa se rareru. Kōshite kare-ra ni meishō ga kudatte iru ni mo kakawarazu,(keiten o) sadzuke rareta-sha-tachi wa, kaette tagai no tame ni arasotta nodearu. Arrā wa, kare-ra ga iron o tonaeru shinri ni tsuite, shinkō suru mono o tokubetsu no o yurushi de michibika reru. Hontōni arrā wa, o kokoronikanau-sha o tadashī michi ni michibika reru
